00050 
00051 NewtonMethod::NewtonMethod(ObjectiveFunctional* newObjectiveFunctional)
00052 : TrainingAlgorithm(newObjectiveFunctional)
00053 {
00054    // Stopping criteria
00055 
00056    evaluationGoal = -1.0e99;
00057    gradientNormGoal = 0.0;
00058    maximumTime = 1.0e6;
00059    maximumNumberOfEpochs = 100;
00060 
00061    // User stuff
00062 
00063    displayPeriod = 25;
00064 }
00065

00090 {
00091    // Stopping criteria
00092 
00093    evaluationGoal = -1.0e99;
00094    gradientNormGoal = 0.0;
00095    maximumTime = 1.0e6;
00096    maximumNumberOfEpochs = 100;
00097 
00098    // User stuff

00100    displayPeriod = 25;

00116 // void train(void) method
00117 
00121 
00122 void NewtonMethod::train(void)
00123 {
00124    // Control sentence (if debug)
00125 
00126    #ifndef NDEBUG 
00127 
00128    if(objectiveFunctional == NULL)
00129    {
00130       std::cerr << std::endl
00131                 << "Flood Error: NewtonMethod class." << std::endl
00132                 << "void train(void) method." << std::endl
00133                 << "Pointer to objective functional object cannot be NULL." << std::endl
00134                 << std::endl;
00135 
00136         exit(1);
00137    }
00138 
00139    #endif
00140 
00141    // Multilayer perceptron stuff
00142 
00143    MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
00144 
00145    Vector<double> freeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getFreeParameters();
00146 
00147    // Evaluation history
00148 
00149 
00150    if(reserveEvaluationHistory)
00151    {
00152       // Evaluation history vector
00153 
00154       Vector<double> newEvaluationHistory(maximumNumberOfEpochs+1);
00155 
00156       evaluationHistory = newEvaluationHistory;
00157 
00158       // Gradient norm training history vector
00159 
00160       Vector<double> newGradientNormHistory(maximumNumberOfEpochs+1);
00161 
00162       gradientNormHistory = newGradientNormHistory;
00163    }
00164    
00165    time_t beginningTime, currentTime;
00166    double elapsedTime = 0.0;
00167 
00168    // Set beginning training time 
00169 
00170    time(&beginningTime);
00171 
00172    if(display)
00173    {
00174       std::cout << std::endl
00175                 << "Training with Newton's method..." 
00176                 << std::endl;
00177    }
00178 
00179    // Initial evaluation
00180    
00181    double evaluation = objectiveFunctional->calculateEvaluation();
00182 
00183    if(evaluation <= evaluationGoal)
00184    {
00185       if(display)
00186       {          
00187          std::cout << std::endl
00188                    << "Initial evaluation is less than goal." << std::endl
00189                    << "Initial evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;
00190       }
00191       
00192       return;
00193    }
00194    else
00195    {
00196       if(display)
00197       {
00198          std::cout << "Initial evaluation: " <<  evaluation << std::endl;      
00199       }
00200    }
00201 
00202    // Initial objective function gradient
00203 
00204    Vector<double> gradient = objectiveFunctional->calculateGradient();
00205 
00206    double gradientNorm = gradient.calculateNorm();
00207 
00208    if(gradientNorm <= gradientNormGoal)
00209    {          
00210       if(display)
00211       {
00212          std::cout << std::endl
00213                    << "Initial gradient norm is less than goal." << std::endl
00214                    << "Initial gradient norm: " << gradientNorm << std::endl;
00215       }
00216                  
00217       return;        
00218    }
00219    else
00220    {
00221       if(display)
00222       {
00223          std::cout << "Initial gradient norm: " <<  gradientNorm << std::endl;      
00224       }
00225    }
00226 
00227    if(reserveEvaluationHistory)
00228    {
00229       evaluationHistory[0] = evaluation;
00230    }
00231 
00232    if(reserveGradientNormHistory)
00233    {
00234       gradientNormHistory[0] = gradientNorm;
00235    }
00236 
00237    // Initial objective function Hessian 
00238 
00239    Matrix<double> inverseHessian = objectiveFunctional->calculateInverseHessian();
00240    
00241    // Main loop
00242 
00243    for(int epoch = 1; epoch <= maximumNumberOfEpochs; epoch++)
00244    {
00245       // Objective function inverse Hessian
00246 
00247       inverseHessian = objectiveFunctional->calculateInverseHessian();
00248 
00249       // Inverse Hessian - gradient product
00250 
00251       freeParameters = freeParameters - inverseHessian*gradient;
00252 
00253       // Set new free parameters
00254 
00255       multilayerPerceptron->setFreeParameters(freeParameters);
00256 
00257       // Objective function evaluation
00258    
00259       evaluation = objectiveFunctional->calculateEvaluation();
00260 
00261       // Objective function gradient
00262 
00263       gradient = objectiveFunctional->calculateGradient();
00264 
00265       gradientNorm = gradient.calculateNorm();
00266 
00267      // Evaluation history
00268 
00269      if(reserveEvaluationHistory)
00270      {
00271          evaluationHistory[epoch] = evaluation;
00272      }
00273 
00274      // Gradient norm history
00275 
00276      if(reserveGradientNormHistory)
00277      {
00278          gradientNormHistory[epoch] = gradientNorm;
00279      }
00280 
00281       // Stopping Criteria
00282 
00283       // Evaluation goal 
00284 
00285       if(evaluation <= evaluationGoal)
00286       {
00287          if(display)
00288          {
00289             std::cout << std::endl
00290                       << "Epoch " << epoch << ": "
00291                       << "Evaluation goal reached." << std::endl;
00292 
00293             std::cout << "Evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;
00294             std::cout << "Gradient norm: " << gradientNorm << std::endl;
00295          }
00296          
00297          break;
00298       }
00299 
00300       // Gradient norm goal 
00301 
00302       if(gradientNorm <= gradientNormGoal)
00303       {
00304          if(display)
00305          {
00306             std::cout << std::endl
00307                       << "Epoch " << epoch << ": "
00308                       << "Gradient norm goal reached."
00309                       << std::endl;  
00310 
00311             std::cout << "Evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;
00312             std::cout << "Gradient norm: " << gradientNorm << std::endl;
00313          }
00314          
00315          break;
00316       }
00317 
00318       // Maximum optimization time
00319 
00320       time(&currentTime);
00321 
00322       elapsedTime = difftime(currentTime, beginningTime);
00323 
00324       if(elapsedTime >= maximumTime)
00325       {
00326          if(display)
00327          {
00328             std::cout << std::endl
00329                       << "Epoch " << epoch << ": "
00330                       << "Maximum optimization time reached."
00331                       << std::endl;
00332 
00333             std::cout << "Evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;
00334             std::cout << "Gradient norm: " << gradientNorm << std::endl;
00335          }
00336          
00337          break;
00338       }
00339 
00340       // Maximum number of epochs
00341 
00342       if(epoch == maximumNumberOfEpochs)
00343       {
00344          if(display)
00345          {
00346             std::cout << std::endl
00347                       << "Epoch " << epoch << ": "
00348                       << "Maximum number of epochs reached."
00349                       << std::endl;
00350 
00351             std::cout << "Evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;
00352             std::cout << "Gradient norm: " << gradientNorm << std::endl;
00353          }
00354         
00355          break;
00356       }
00357 
00358       // Progress
00359 
00360       if(display && epoch % displayPeriod == 0)
00361       {
00362          std::cout << std::endl
00363                    << "Epoch " << epoch << ";" << std::endl;
00364 
00365          std::cout << "Evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;
00366          std::cout << "Gradient norm: " << gradientNorm << std::endl;
00367       }
00368    } 
00369 }

00390 
00391 void NewtonMethod::print(void)
00392 { 
00393 
00394    std::cout << std::endl
00395              << "Newton Method Object." << std::endl;
00396 
00397    // Stopping criteria
00398 
00399    std::cout << "Evaluation goal:" << std::endl
00400              << evaluationGoal << std::endl
00401              << "Gradient norm goal:" << std::endl
00402              << gradientNormGoal << std::endl
00403              << "Maximum time:" << std::endl
00404              << maximumTime << std::endl 
00405              << "Maximum number of epochs:" << std::endl
00406              << maximumNumberOfEpochs << std::endl; 
00407 
00408    // User stuff
00409 
00410    std::cout << "Display:" << std::endl
00411              << display << std::endl
00412              << "Display period:" << std::endl
00413              << displayPeriod << std::endl;
00414 }

00439 void NewtonMethod::save(char* filename)
00440 {
00441    // File
00442 
00443    std::fstream file;
00444 
00445    file.open(filename, std::ios::out);
00446 
00447    if(!file.is_open())
00448    {
00449       std::cerr << std::endl 
00450                 << "Flood Error: NewtonMethod class." << std::endl
00451                 << "void save(char*) method." << std::endl
00452                 << "Cannot open Newton method object data file."  << std::endl
00453                 << std::endl;
00454 
00455       exit(1);
00456    }
00457    else
00458    {
00459       if(display)
00460       {
00461          std::cout << std::endl
00462                    << "Saving Newton method object to data file..." << std::endl;
00463       }
00464    }
00465 
00466    // Write file header
00467 
00468 
00469    file << "% Flood Neural Network. Newton Method Object." << std::endl;
00470 
00471    // Training parameters
00472 
00473 
00474    // Stopping criteria
00475 
00476    file << "EvaluationGoal:" << std::endl
00477         << evaluationGoal << std::endl
00478         << "GradientNormGoal:" << std::endl
00479         << gradientNormGoal << std::endl
00480         << "MaximumTime: " << std::endl
00481         << maximumTime << std::endl
00482         << "MaximumNumberOfEpochs: " << std::endl
00483         << maximumNumberOfEpochs << std::endl;
00484 
00485    // User stuff
00486 
00487    file << "Display: " << std::endl
00488         << display << std::endl;
00489 
00490    file << "DisplayPeriod: " << std::endl
00491         << displayPeriod << std::endl;
00492 
00493    file.close();
00494 }

00519 
00520 void NewtonMethod::load(char* filename)
00521 {
00522    std::string word;
00523 
00524    // File
00525 
00526    std::fstream file;
00527 
00528    file.open(filename, std::ios::in);
00529 
00530    if(!file.is_open())
00531    {
00532       std::cerr << std::endl
00533                 << "Flood Error: NewtonMethod class." << std::endl
00534                 << "void load(char*) method."
00535                 << std::endl
00536                 << "Cannot open Newton method object data file."  << std::endl;
00537 
00538       exit(1);
00539    }
00540    else
00541    {
00542       if(display)
00543       {
00544          std::cout << std::endl
00545                    << "Loading Newton method object from data file..."
00546                    << std::endl;
00547       }
00548    }
00549 
00550    // Stopping criteria: 
00551 
00552    // Evaluation goal
00553 
00554    file >> word;
00555 
00556    file >> evaluationGoal;
00557    
00558    // Gradient norm goal
00559 
00560    file >> word;
00561 
00562    file >> gradientNormGoal;
00563 
00564    // Maximum time
00565 
00566    file >> word;
00567 
00568    file >> maximumTime;
00569 
00570    // Maximum number of epochs
00571 
00572    file >> word;
00573 
00574    file >> maximumNumberOfEpochs;
00575 
00576    // User stuff: 
00577 
00578    // Display
00579 
00580    file >> word;
00581 
00582    file >> display;
00583 
00584    // Display period
00585 
00586    file >> word;
00587 
00588    file >> displayPeriod;
00589 
00590    file.close();
00591 }

00593 // void resizeTrainingHistory(int) method
00594 
00611 
00612 void NewtonMethod::resizeTrainingHistory(int newSize)
00613 {
00614    // Free parameters history matrix
00615 
00616    if(reserveFreeParametersHistory)
00617    {
00618       MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
00619                                         
00620       int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
00621                                    
00622       freeParametersHistory.resize(newSize, numberOfFreeParameters);
00623    }
00624 
00625    // Free parameters norm history vector
00626 
00627    if(reserveFreeParametersNormHistory)
00628    {
00629       freeParametersNormHistory.resize(newSize);
00630    }
00631 
00632    // Evaluation history vector
00633 
00634    if(reserveEvaluationHistory)
00635    {
00636       evaluationHistory.resize(newSize);
00637    }
00638 
00639    // Gradient history matrix
00640 
00641    if(reserveGradientHistory)
00642    {
00643       MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
00644                                         
00645       int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
00646 
00647       gradientHistory.resize(newSize, numberOfFreeParameters);
00648    }
00649  
00650    // Gradient norm training history vector
00651 
00652    if(reserveGradientNormHistory)
00653    {
00654       gradientNormHistory.resize(newSize);
00655    }
00656 
00657    // Elapsed time history vector
00658 
00659    if(reserveElapsedTimeHistory)
00660    {
00661       elapsedTimeHistory.resize(newSize);
00662    }
00663 }
